name: n8n
description: deploy n8n to heroku without any hassle

DOMAIN_NAME.description: Your app URL - [name of app].herokuapp.com / example.com / abc.example.com, if you don't need WEBHOOK_TUNNEL_URL no need to set this field

N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: N8N Encryption Key, DON'T USE DEFAULT

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_ACTIVE.description: Protect n8n setup with basic authentication, set 'true' to enable or leave blank

GENERIC_TIMEZONE.description: Time Zone to use with Heroku. You can find the name of your timezone here: https://momentjs.com/timezone/

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_USER.description: Basic Authentication User for n8n, leave blank if not needed

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: Basic Authentication Password to secure n8n, leave blank if not needed
